summary: A sneak, block, and one handed focused follower available in UNPB & CBBE; with and without armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#ff7700][size=6][b]Kellece[/b][/size][/color]

[color=#efefef][size=3][i]She's loyal, charismatic, funny and perhaps a little too arrogant. But this is all just a facade, a mechanism to deal with her position.

She was born in a large family in an important port. She lived out of trouble until she was about 17 years old, but at that point life began to change.

She started to travel a lot and was learning how to cook in new styles. Through hard work, she reached the top in a fast world. But with her bravery and wisdom, there's nothing to stop her from climbing to the top. She could quickly become somebody we can expect great things of.

But for now that's speculation; she is currently travelling the world. She feels like there's more than we know in this world. Luckily she has great companions to support her.[/i][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Verdana]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/leo3uhfd3/20161025024138_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Kellece
Race:  Custom Redguard Race
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1
Weight:  .75
Body:  Base CBBE & UNPB
Skin:  Fair Skin - Optimized
Armor/Weapons:  Schwertleite Set
Location:  Windpeak Inn - Dawnstar

Class:  Combat Warrior
Style:  Boss One-Handed

Levels with player.  Redguard traits/bonuses.
Skill Bonuses:  Sneak, Block, One Hand, Light Armor
Complete Perk Trees:  Sneak, Block, One Hand

Tested with EFF & AFT
ENBs:  RealVision & Vividian

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/izw8a1z47/20161025025527_1.jpg[/img]

Modified Skeleton such as XPMSE

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
Kellece's skin may appear lighter or darker depending on your ENB and/or Lighting
(Her skin is set as dark as Skyrim allows)

Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

Armor may clip during some poses/animations

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/70kof7h1j/Q&A.png[/img]
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  What is the other armor shown in some screenshots?
A:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77215/?]UNP Ranger Outfit[/url] & [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48446/?]Sorceress Armor[/url]

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
